name: Key Escape
description:
Key Escape is a puzzle game, a platform where your goal is to pick the padlock and return to the door to get to the next level.

The game contains 50 (fifty) challenging stages for you to have fun and spend your time trying to complete your goal. Throughout these 50 (fifty) stages you will have more than 5 (five) different mechanics, such as: trampoline, balloons, thorns, etc.

• 50 incredible stages to challenge you
• +5 Different Mechanics
• A good background music
